overview:
Dave Lipscomb drives engineering, product management, and IT operations for NetSuite. He has been at the company since its first inception in 1998. Under his leadership, NetSuite enables thousands of customers worldwide to manage their business in real-time, and the NetSuite service has achieved unprecedented uptime and reliability in the on-demand industry.

Prior to joining NetSuite, Mr. Lipscomb founded mBED Software with Evan Goldberg. He was also a director in Oracle’s New Media Division. Mr. Lipscomb has been building client/server and Web server software products for eighteen years. He holds a B.S. in Computer Science from Stanford University.
